ValidationRule.description: When Opp is a Core Conversion, then a Reason is needed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "Transfer - Core to MMS") , $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", LEN(Core_Conversion_Reason__c) = 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Lead Source is Transfer - Core to MMS then you need to input a Conversion Reason
